title: NHPC to double capacity to 15 GW in 5 years: CMD Raj Kumar Chaudhary
description: NHPC Ltd plans to more than double its installed capacity to 15,000 MW in 4-5 years. The firm is working on hydro and solar projects totaling 10,692 MW. The company is also focusing on pumped hydro storage projects and has diversified into solar power. Government support will ease land acquisition and other project challenges.
